"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Description"	"以致命的精準度射出一支能飛行相當距離的箭矢，對第一個擊中的敵方單位造成傷害和暈眩效果。隨著的箭矢飛行距離越遠，暈眩時間將從最小值的 0.01 秒逐漸提升至最大值的 %arrow_max_stun% 秒，且傷害也會隨距離附加最高到 %arrow_bonus_damage% 的額外傷害。月神之箭將會秒殺非遠古的非英雄單位。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Description"	"Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_Description"	"影魔將他目前為止用支配死靈技能所捕獲的靈魂匯聚起來轉換成魔能衝擊波，接著讓它們線狀的方式往四周釋放。敵人距離影魔夠近的話將能一次受到多道魔能衝擊波殺傷。任何受到靈魂輓歌殺傷的單位將受到移動速度降低和攻擊傷害降低效果。每兩個靈魂將能形成一道衝擊波。靈魂輓歌會在影魔死亡時自動施放，且將不會影響到技能的冷卻時間。\n\n能夠裝備阿哈利姆神杖升級。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_Description"	"Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodrage"	"Bloodrage"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodrage_Description"	"令一個單位陷入渴望鮮血的狂怒中，提升對方於狂怒期間所造成和承受的傷害。受噬血狂暴影響的單位在擊殺任何單位時將會接受同等於被擊殺者的最大生命值的一定百分比的治療，而若是受噬血狂暴影響者自己遭到擊殺的話則將反過來治療擊殺者。擊殺治療可在受效者和死亡英雄彼此相隔 300 距離內時省略擊殺行為施加 50% 的療效。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodrage_Description"	"Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer. If you do not get the last hit, but are within 300 AoE of the dying hero, you will take 50% of the heal."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_shadow_poison_Description"	"對直線範圍內的敵方單位造成基礎傷害，同時施加一層暗影劇毒減幅去於劇毒釋放時造成額外傷害。額外傷害為疊加傷害乘以 1/2/4/8/16，最多疊加 5 次。暗影劇毒在超出 5 層之後則是每層追加造成 50 傷害。暗影劇毒的額外傷害和追加傷害將於減幅結束時釋放，也可主動提前釋放。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_shadow_poison_Description"	"Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used."

After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."

If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units."

Additionally, for each 5%% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support"	"Support"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 1 級</font>\n治療靈氣：\n每隔 2 秒治療位在年獸周遭 1100 半徑範圍內的友方 10 點生命值。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 2</font>\n真實視野：\n給予 1100 半徑距離的真實視野。\n煙霧靈氣：\n英雄當站在年獸附近不動時將進入詭計之霧的隱形狀態。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 3</font>\n復活靈氣：\n若有英雄在年獸週遭的 1100 半徑範圍以內死亡，則死亡者將可於 3 秒後復活。每復活一人後需冷卻 20 秒才能再次生效。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 1</font>\nHealing Aura:\nHeals 10 HP every 2 seconds in a 1100 area of effect around the Beast.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\nTruesight:\nGrants truesight in a 1100 radius.\nThe Beast will use Mekansm and Arcane Boots every 35 seconds in a 750 radius.\nSmoke Aura:\nWhile standing near the Beast, heroes are smoked.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\nResurrection Aura:\nIf a hero dies in an 1100 radius of the Beast, it will be resurrected after 3 seconds.  This effect can only happen once every 20 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Support Path have independent cooldowns for Arcane Boots, Mek, and Resurrection Aura."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_aura"	"輔助"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_aura"	"Support"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_aura_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 1 級</font>\n治療靈氣：\n每隔 2 秒治療位在年獸周遭 1100 半徑範圍內的友方 10 點生命值。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 2</font>\n真實視野：\n給予 1100 半徑距離的真實視野。\n年獸會每隔 35 秒使用一次梅肯斯姆和奧術靴，施效範圍為半徑 750。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 3</font>\n復活靈氣：\n若有英雄在年獸週遭的 1100 半徑範圍以內死亡，則死亡者將可於 3 秒後復活。每復活一人後需冷卻 20 秒才能再次生效。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_aura_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 1</font>\nHealing Aura:\nHeals 10 HP every 2 seconds in a 1100 area of effect around the Beast.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\nTruesight:\nGrants truesight in a 1100 radius.\nThe Beast will use Mekansm and Arcane Boots every 35 seconds in a 750 radius.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\nResurrection Aura:\nIf a hero dies in an 1100 radius of the Beast, it will be resurrected after 3 seconds.  This effect can only happen once every 20 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Support Path have independent cooldowns for Arcane Boots, Mek, and Resurrection Aura."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_0"	"輔助靈氣"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_0"	"Support Aura"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_0_description"	"等 1 級：治療靈氣：\n每隔 2 秒治療位在年獸周遭 1100 半徑範圍內的友方 10 點生命值。\n等級 2：真實視野：\n給予 1100 半徑距離的真實視野。\n年獸會每隔 35 秒使用一次梅肯斯姆和奧術靴，施效範圍為半徑 750。\n等級 3：復活靈氣：\n若有英雄在年獸週遭的 1100 半徑範圍以內死亡，則死亡者將可於 3 秒後復活。每復活一人後需冷卻 20 秒才能再次生效。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_0_description"	"Lvl 1: Healing Aura:\nHeals 10 HP every 2 seconds in a 1100 area of effect around the Beast.\nLvl 2: Truesight:\nGrants truesight in a 1100 radius.\nThe Beast will use Mekansm and Arcane Boots every 35 seconds in a 750 radius.\nLvl 3: Resurrection Aura:\nIf a hero dies in an 1100 radius of the Beast, it will be resurrected after 3 seconds.  This effect can only happen once every 20 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Support Path have independent cooldowns for Arcane Boots, Mek, and Resurrection Aura."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_1"	"輔助靈氣"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_1"	"Support Aura"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_1_description"	"等 1 級：治療靈氣：\n每隔 2 秒治療位在年獸周遭 1100 半徑範圍內的友方 10 點生命值。\n等級 2：真實視野：\n給予 1100 半徑距離的真實視野。\n年獸會每隔 35 秒使用一次梅肯斯姆和奧術靴，施效範圍為半徑 750。\n等級 3：復活靈氣：\n若有英雄在年獸週遭的 1100 半徑範圍以內死亡，則死亡者將可於 3 秒後復活。每復活一人後需冷卻 20 秒才能再次生效。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_1_description"	"Lvl 1: Healing Aura:\nHeals 10 HP every 2 seconds in a 1100 area of effect around the Beast.\nLvl 2: Truesight:\nGrants truesight in a 1100 radius.\nThe Beast will use Mekansm and Arcane Boots every 35 seconds in a 750 radius.\nLvl 3: Resurrection Aura:\nIf a hero dies in an 1100 radius of the Beast, it will be resurrected after 3 seconds.  This effect can only happen once every 20 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Support Path have independent cooldowns for Arcane Boots, Mek, and Resurrection Aura."

"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat"	"戰鬥"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat"	"Combat"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等 1 級</font>\n重擊：\n年獸的攻擊有著 12% 機率造成暈眩，持續 1 秒。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 2</font>\n尖刺外殼：\n當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內時，年獸將隨著受到攻擊使出尖刺外殼，把受到的傷害反射給攻擊者，並暈眩對方。\n狂戰士怒吼：\n當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 300 以內時，他們將不自主地朝年獸攻擊 2.5 秒。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\n強力變形：\n年獸釋放出充滿魔力的煙霧，煙霧將逐漸向外擴散 1000 距離，把接觸到煙霧的敵人通通變成無害的豬 4 秒。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 1</font>\nBash:\nThe Beast gains a 12% chance to stun attacked enemies for 1 second.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\nSpiked Carapace:\nIf 2 or more heroes are within 500 range of the Beast, the Beast will stun and reflect damage if attacked.\nBerserker's Call:\nIf there are 2 or more heroes within 300 range of the Beast, they will be forced to attack it for 2.5 seconds.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\nGreater Hex:\nThe Beast unleashes a magical smoke that expands outward in a 1000 radius, turning enemy units into harmless pigs for 4 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Combat Path have independent chances to proc Bash, and independent cooldowns for Berserker's Call, Spiked Carapace, and Greater Hex."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed"	"速度"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed"	"Speed"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等 1 級</font>\n攻擊速度靈氣：\n距離年獸 900 範圍內的友方單位的功擊速度將提升 30。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 2</font>\n萬馬奔騰：\n若有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內，年獸將使出萬馬奔騰，令所有友方單位獲得疾速和相位效果，持續 3 秒。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 3</font>\n刷新靈氣：\n友方英雄在距離年獸 900 範圍以內時所施放的法術將有 50%% 的機率會在施放後瞬間刷新。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 1</font>\nAttack Speed Aura:\nAllied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\nStampede:\nIf there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\nRefresher Aura:\nWhen an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and indepedent chances to proc Refresher Aura."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_0"	"Speed Aura"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_0_Description"	"等 1 級：\n攻擊速度靈氣：\n距離年獸 900 範圍內的友方單位的功擊速度將提升 30。\n\n等級 2：\n萬馬奔騰：\n若有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內，年獸將使出萬馬奔騰，令所有友方單位獲得疾速和相位效果，持續 3 秒。\n\n等級 3：\n刷新靈氣：\n友方英雄在距離年獸 900 範圍以內時所施放的法術將有 50%% 的機率會在施放後瞬間刷新。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_0_Description"	"Level 1:\nAttack Speed Aura:\nAllied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.\n\nLevel 2:\nStampede:\nIf there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.n\nLevel 3:\nRefresher Aura:\nWhen an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and independent chances to proc Refresher Aura."

While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_river_painter_Description"	"使用此道具來將藥劑倒入河中，令河水變為液態鉻，持續 15 分鐘。<font color='#FF5555'>此物品將從您的軍械庫存貨中消耗一次用度。若於效力結束前被藥效更強的河水藥瓶覆蓋，該次的使用次數將不作計算。</font>河水藥瓶必需要在軍械庫中備有至少一次用額才能使用。用額不會隨著此道具在遊戲內被賣掉、被丟下、或被摧毀而耗用，僅會隨著成功改變河水而消耗。藥效較低的河水藥劑無法覆蓋藥效較高者。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_river_painter_Description"	"Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_dance_Description"	"齊天大聖躍上樹頂伺機而動。處於樹頂時將可施展「乾坤之躍」技能。若齊天大聖的腳下樹木被毀，他將摔落地面且被暈眩 4 秒。同時，受到源自玩家或羅煞的傷害將令此技能進入冷卻。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_dance_Description"	"Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown."
